meanings.definition: A charm or talisman believed to bring good luck or ward off evil.
meanings.sent1: She always carries her greegrees in her pocket for good luck.
meanings.sent2: The necklace with the greegrees is her favorite piece of jewelry.
meanings.sent3: When she lost her greegrees, she thought her luck had run out.
meanings.sent4: The greegrees around her neck seemed to protect her from harm.
meanings.sent5: The old greegrees had been passed down for generations, each time bringing fortune to its owner.

meanings.definition: A small object worn as a fetish or amulet.
meanings.sent1: He kept the greegrees in his pocket as a lucky charm.
meanings.sent2: The greegrees around her wrist jingled softly as she moved.
meanings.sent3: The greegrees on his keychain made him feel invincible.
meanings.sent4: She treasured the greegrees given to her by her grandmother.
meanings.sent5: The shiny greegrees caught the sunlight, sparkling with magic.

meanings.definition: To use or believe in greegrees for protection or luck.
meanings.sent1: She would greegrees her way through every exam for good luck.
meanings.sent2: He greegreesed his new job interview by wearing his lucky tie.
meanings.sent3: The superstitious athlete greegreesed before every game to ensure victory.
meanings.sent4: She greegreesed her path with lucky charms to ward off any misfortune.
meanings.sent5: The actor greegreesed by carrying a special trinket to every audition, believing it brought him success.
